reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We decided to book a nice little hotel in north holland on our last visit over there to visit my husbands family. He lives in the south, and had never really been to edam or the surrounding areas either.
reviews.title: Outstanding food

reviews.text: Edam is a small place, much quainter and less touristy than Volendam.
reviews.title: A delightful hotel in an adorable little town....
